amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to cut funding for the Great Lakes Authority in half and transfer the difference to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Great Lakes Authority by $2,500,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 295 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 295 (Roll no. 372).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
